statements: UPDATE ethically_validated_data SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ethically_validated_data SET date_of_birth = '2000-01-01', gender = 'Other' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ethically_validated_data SET gender = 'Female', age = 25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ethically_validated_data SET name = 'John Doe', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE EthicalDataValidationRules SET age = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DataValidationLogs SET message = 'Data entry corrected' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE EthicalDataValidationRules SET age = 30, name = 'John' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DataValidationLogs SET message = 'Data validation successful', entry_time = '2023-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE EthicalDataValidation SET is_verified = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DataValidationLog SET description = 'Data corrected and verified' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE EthicalDataValidation SET email = 'newemail@example.com', age = 25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EthicsRuleViolations SET violation_type = 'Privacy Breach', violation_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET age = 25 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = price * 0.9 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE Users SET age = 25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET price = 99.99, stock_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Products SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 1, price = price * 0.9 WHERE product_id = 10
